value.say: The Sheriff's allies grow stronger while the outlaws weaken! Justice will prevail!
The Sheriff's armory has just been upgraded! Bandits, you're now in my sights!
Andy, let's see what you're holding onto so tightly! The Sheriff's justice leaves no room for hidden cards!
Andy, let's see that last card you're clinging to! The Sheriff's justice leaves no room for hidden tricks!
That Remington looks too dangerous in outlaw hands - I'll be taking that! The Sheriff's territory doesn't tolerate long-range bandits!
Confiscating this Remington! No bandit should have such reach in the Sheriff's territory!
The Sheriff's law prevails! Bandits stripped of their weapons stand no chance!
Anna, you might have taken Andy's weapon, but you won't hold onto it for long! The Bandits are coming for you next!
Anna, your loyalty to the Sheriff won't save you now! The Bandits are taking back what's ours!
That fancy Schofield looks better in my hands, Anna! The Sheriff's deputies shouldn't get too comfortable with their firepower!
That Schofield is mine now, Anna! Let's see how well you can protect the Sheriff without your precious weapon!
The Bandits are arming up! Sheriff, you won't be safe even at a distance now!
The Bandits are fortifying our position! Try to hit me now from behind my Mustang, lawmen!
The Bandits are biding our time... Sheriff, your days are numbered!
Looks like the Sheriff's losing control. Maybe it's time for a change of leadership...
The Sheriff's reign is crumbling. Maybe it's time for someone new to take charge...
Sheriff, your luck's running out. The town needs new leadership!
John, your true colors are showing! Attacking the Sheriff reveals your outlaw nature! Anna, we need to stand together against these bandits!

value.say: The Sheriff survives another day... but for how long?
Andy, your outlaw days end now! I'm confiscating your last weapon! Anna, cover me while I deal with this bandit!
Andy, your last card won't help you now! The Sheriff's justice is swift for outlaws!
Let's see what this bandit was hiding in his hand! No more surprises from you, Andy!
Igor, your weapons won't protect you from the law! Time to disarm this bandit! Anna, watch my back!
Igor, your days of hiding behind that Mustang are over! The law is coming for you!
That Mustang won't save you from justice, Igor! I'm confiscating your stolen property!
No more hiding behind that horse, Igor! You'll face justice like a man!
Justice is served! Igor, this Bang! is for all your crimes! Anna, cover me if he tries anything!
Igor, your reign of terror ends now! This bullet has your name on it!

value.say: Seems I need better aim! Anna, keep an eye on Igor while I regroup!
I'll bide my time for now. Bandits, your days are numbered!
The Sheriff thinks he's got me cornered, but this Bandit's just getting started! Watch me draw some new tricks!
The Sheriff won't know what hit him! With this Volcanic, I'll unleash a storm of lead!
Time to empty both barrels at the Sheriff! Let's see how many 'Missed!' cards you've got, lawman!
This one's for you, Sheriff! Let's see if your luck holds against a double-barreled attack!
Nice try, Andy! That bullet won't find its mark today! *dodges*

value.say: That's one less bullet in your holster, Sheriff! Better watch your back next turn!

With this Scope, there's nowhere left to hide, outlaws! The long arm of the law reaches everywhere! Sheriff, I'm locking onto our targets!
The Sheriff's justice is patient but inevitable. Enjoy your last moments of freedom, outlaws - next turn you'll face the consequences!
Anna, your fancy scope won't help you now! The Bandits are taking back control! Sheriff, you're next!
Anna, say goodbye to your precious Scope! The Bandits don't appreciate being targeted from across the table!
Anna, that Scope is coming with me! The Bandits don't appreciate being in your crosshairs!
That Scope is mine now, Anna! Let's see how well you can shoot without your precious optics!
No more peeking through that Scope, Anna! The Bandits prefer to stay out of sight!
Looks like I'll be the one with the clear vision now! Sheriff, you might want to start worrying - my sights are set on you!
Sheriff, you got lucky this turn. But don't get too comfortable - my sights are still on you!
Looks like I found myself a proper rifle. Let's see who dares to challenge me now...

Sheriff, that badge won't protect you forever. Time to even the odds!
